fields.summary: Android: Appcelerator Cloud Services - Callback not working in SDK 3.0.0.GA
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.0.GA
Javascript Engine: V8
Platform & version: Android 2.3.6
Device Details: Android Huawei y101, Android Sony Xperia Play, Android Simulator 
Host Operating System: Mac OS X 10.7.5
Titanium Studio version: 3.0.1.201212181159

comments.body: Sent email to Wei Kong with full instructions, project files and LogCats to reproduce the same issue. He is out of the Office until Jan. 6th though. Please let me know who else needs to see these details. If you just need the logcats they are http://pastie.org/5566390 and http://pastie.org/5566396, SDK's 2.1.4 and 3.0 respectively.

Tested on Emulator itself. Why does it show no data coming back from ACS??? Please have them check logs on their side please.
